means: 无意义地，无用地，无益地

sentence.Network_en: Chemicals were pointlessly poisoning the soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 化学品在无谓地污染着土壤。

sentence.Network_en: It's pointlessly trying to keep your friendship secret — it's common knowledge already.
sentence.Network_cn: 你们无须将友情保密——其实已尽人皆知.

sentence.Network_en: He spent his life in pointlessly tiresome drudgery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的一生都在做毫无意义的烦人的苦差事.

PerfectNetExp.abs: he spent his life in pointlessly tiresome drudgery .他的一生都在做毫无意义的烦人的苦差事。

list.abs: this will be seen as pointlessly annoying .这就是照顾全局的观点.

entry.tran: 无益的；无意义的；无目的的
entry.def: If you say that something is pointless, you are criticizing it because it has no sense or purpose.

example.ex: Without an audience the performance is pointless.
example.tran: 没有观众，表演就不成其为表演了。

sentences.sentence: "he spent his life in pointlessly tiresome drudgery"

auth_sentence.content: Why is unhappy eating the most pointlessly secret of miseries?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why is unhappy eating the most pointlessly secret of miseries?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why is unhappy eating the most pointlessly secret of miseries?

auth_sentence.content: But always be wary that you may be spending your money pointlessly.
auth_sentence.res_content: But always be wary that you may be spending your money pointlessly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But always be wary that you may be spending your money pointlessly.

auth_sentence.content: This is a crucial part of its purpose, as it does not lure ants from the nest pointlessly, after a food has gone.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a crucial part of its purpose, as it does not lure ants from the nest pointlessly, after a food has gone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a crucial part of its purpose, as it does not lure ants from the nest pointlessly, after a food has gone.
